title: League Merch at Anime Expo 2016
body:
We’re excited to announce that the Riot Merch team will be manning an official League merch booth at Anime Expo from 7/1 to 7/4 at the Los Angeles Convention Center. Come check us out if you’re in town or attending AX (Exhibit Hall, Booth # 215)!

In addition to the Merch booth, Rioters will be walking the show floor with a special gift for League cosplayers as our way of saying thank you for being an awesome part of the community. ~~Also, be sure to head over to Kentia Hall each day from 12:45 PM - 1:45 PM to have your picture taken with the one and only Poro King!~~ _(unfortunately we've had to cancel the Poro King photo ops. You can grab a picture of his Royal Poro-ness at the Riot Merch booth all weekend long.)_

To work something like this would it fall under the event staff category?  Thanks!

Hi Sushi Devourer, if you mean in terms of different Riot teams, that's certainly one area. For this event particularly, it will be a combination of various members of Merch, Community and Player Relations.
